metadata.title: CVE-2020-14093 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Mutt before 1.14.3 allows an IMAP fcc/postpone man-in-the-middle attack viaa PREAUTH response.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-14093` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mutt - 1.13.2-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mutt package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.13.2-1ubuntu0.1').
